subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bartolo Colon, the subject of rumors before the trading deadline, could still be sent to a contender through the waiver system. His performance against San Francisco did little to help his value, though.
snippet: Bartolo Colon, the subject of rumors before the trading deadline, could still be sent to a contender through the waiver system. His performance against San Francisco did little to help his value, though.
